entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit customer support. Your call may be recorded for quality assurance. How can I help you today?
Hi, I recently received a VeloFit bike that I ordered, and I'm not happy with it. It seems to be damaged.
I'm sorry to hear that you received a damaged bike. Could you please describe the damage?

Well, the most obvious thing is that the frame. It has a pretty significant crack along the top tube. Also, the front wheel seems like it’s… well it has a very wobbly wheel. It doesn't seem safe to ride at all.

Oh dear, that sounds like significant damage. It seems likely this is due to shipping damage. A cracked frame and a wobbly wheel are certainly not acceptable. I sincerely apologize for the inconvenience this has caused you.
Yeah, I was really looking forward to getting out and riding.

I understand your frustration completely. To resolve this immediately, I can offer you a full refund for the bike. We can also arrange for the bike to be returned to us, completely free of charge to you.

Absolutely. I'll email you a free label right now that you can use to return the bike. Just repack it in the original box if possible, affix the label, and drop it off at any authorized carrier location. Once we receive the returned bike, we’ll process the full refund to your original payment method. Does that sound good?
That sounds perfect! Thank you so much!

You're very welcome! Again, I apologize for the inconvenience caused by the defective bike and the shipping damage. Please allow 7-10 business days for the refund to appear in your account. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
No, I think that's everything. Thank you for your help!
You're very welcome. Thank you for choosing VeloFit. Have a great day!
